One mL of methanolic extract (5 mg/mL in acetone-water solution) was mixed with 200 µL of Folin-Ciocalteau reagent and 1 mL of 2% Na Total flavonoids were determined using the AlCl The herbal mixture powder (120 g) was exposed to hydrodistillation using a Clevenger type apparatus for about 4 h.
